title: The divine authority of the scriptures a sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Sept. 2. 1695 : being the sixth of the lecture for the said year, founded by the honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by John Williams ...
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill, Senr & Junr ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Half title: Dr. Williams's sixth sermon at Mr. Boyl's lecture, 1695.
